urls.title: Caribbean Airlines | Book flights, cheap tickets & low fares
urls.description: Caribbean Airlines offers Caribbean flights, cheap tickets, low fares, extra legroom & comfort, free meals & inflight entertainment & Caribbean Miles rewards!

data.text:
Here’s what you’ll get with these LITE Fares:

✔️ 1 free carry-on bag
✔️ 1 free personal bag
✔️ Advanced seat selection 

Book now, while fares last: https://t.co/yN8MDOSbfu

➡️ https://t.co/MhV1VoUqIG for health & safety requirements for your trip

#iflycaribbean #iamcaribbean

How pretty is Portland? 😍

Fly from New York to Jamaica from as low as *$173 USD 

Do you know where this is? 👀 https://t.co/gP16nESv5L

There just aren’t enough words to describe how gorgeous Guyana is 😍

Fly to Guyana from New York from as low as *$185 USD

Can you guess the name of this location?🤔 https://t.co/Nn7cR2m37X

Let’s hear it for New Yoooooooork 🗣🗽

Fly to New York from Jamaica from as low as *$235 USD

Fly to New York from Guyana from as low as *$250 USD https://t.co/bPm4wLoN4z

Spring time is simply the best time, we don’t make the rules 🤷🏿‍♂️😊🌺🌸

With that being said....

✨incoming, low fares and big views✨

A thread:

Please note that restaurants and other shops at airports may have changed their operating hours. While our in-flight service meal service remains temporarily suspended, it's advisable to pack a snack before getting to the airport.  #iflycaribbean #iamcaribbean https://t.co/PyiGdEsinM

data.text: Keeping it Clean! In line with aviation standards, an electrostatic sprayer containing medical-grade disinfectant is used as part of our sanitisation routine for the entire aircraft #iflycaribbean #iamcaribbean https://t.co/jKqOv5jXok

Caribbean Airlines advises that due to activity of the La Soufriere Volcano, the following flights to/from St. Vincent for Saturday 10 April, 2021 are cancelled: https://t.co/nqSTMgWN8A #LaSoufriere #StVincent

We’re keeping you safe. All jet aircraft are installed with High-Efficiency Particulate Air (HEPA) filtration systems which capture 99.9% of airborne particles, including viruses, while continuously purifying the air inside the cabins. #iflycaribbean #iamcaribbean https://t.co/vF4PYAu0SP

Happy World Health Day!  At Caribbean Airlines we're doing our part to build a fairer, healthier world. Our Platinum certification by APEX Health Safety reaffirms our commitment to the wellness of our customers and employees.  https://t.co/1hZeKZZDin
#iflycaribbean #iamcaribbean https://t.co/w4E7NKNU51

data.text: Last May, we made history with our inaugural cargo-only charter flight followed by shipments of 159 dairy cows. We’ve since transported over 60,000 ducklings and 190,000 pounds of fresh produce on cargo charter flights between Guyana, Toronto and Trinidad. Here are some pics. https://t.co/B0GYHQIy3C

Love is… chilling and toasting with coconuts 🥥 while basking in the warm sunshine ☀️ in a tropical paradise 🌴 

Be inspired to book your flight ✈️ to spark the Caribbean love 💕
